description: Data models and enums for appointment management including calendar appointments, time slots, themes, and view modes

components.AppointmentStatus: Enum defining comprehensive appointment lifecycle states from scheduled to completed.

components.CalendarAppointment: Enhanced appointment model specifically designed for calendar view with technician assignment and color coding.

rules: Comprehensive appointment status enum: scheduled, confirmed, checkedIn, inProgress, completed, cancelled, noShow, rescheduled.
Customer and services integration with full model relationships for complete appointment data.
Technician assignment with ID and optional name for display optimization without lookups.
DateTime-based start and end time management with duration calculations.
Color coding system based on technician assignment for visual calendar organization.
Blocked time slot support for technician breaks, lunch, and off-time scheduling.
Group appointment functionality with group member ID tracking.
Recurring appointment support with pattern specification (weekly, biweekly, monthly).
Business logic getters: durationMinutes, durationHours, isToday, isPast, isCurrentlyActive.
Permission-based operations: canEdit, canCancel based on status and timing.
Total cost calculation aggregating all service prices for financial planning.
Status display text mapping for user-friendly status presentation.
Status color mapping providing visual status indicators with appropriate colors.
JSON serialization support with proper DateTime and Color handling.
Factory constructor with enum status resolution and fallback values.
CopyWith pattern for immutable updates with selective field modification.
Equality and hashCode implementation based on unique appointment ID.
Professional toString method providing comprehensive appointment summary.
Notes field for additional appointment context and special instructions.

components.CalendarDay: Comprehensive day model containing appointments, time slots, technician assignments, and business analytics.

components.DaySummary: Analytics summary class providing day-level statistics and performance metrics.

components.ListExtension: Extension adding firstOrNull getter to List<T> for null-safe operations.

rules: Complete day representation with appointments, time slots, and technician availability.
Per-technician time slot mapping with comprehensive availability tracking.
Technician name mapping for efficient display without repeated database lookups.
Day classification: isToday, isWeekend, isHoliday with optional holiday naming.
Technician-specific appointment filtering with getAppointmentsForTechnician method.
Available slot retrieval per technician for booking optimization.
Appointment status filtering with getAppointmentsByStatus for workflow management.
Business analytics: totalAppointments, earliestAppointmentTime, latestAppointmentTime.
Revenue calculation based on completed appointments for financial reporting.
Technician utilization metrics calculating booking percentage for performance analysis.
Conflict detection identifying overlapping appointments for the same technician.
Time overlap calculation ensuring accurate conflict identification.
Next available slot finder with duration and time preferences for booking assistance.
DaySummary generation providing comprehensive day statistics and metrics.
Average utilization calculation across all technicians for operational insights.
JSON serialization with complex nested object handling for data persistence.
CopyWith pattern supporting immutable updates of day configuration.
Equality implementation based on date for proper day comparison.
Extension methods adding null-safe first element access to lists.

components.CalendarTheme: Static theming class providing comprehensive styling and color management for calendar components.

rules: Predefined technician color palette with 12 distinct colors for visual differentiation.
Hash-based consistent color assignment ensuring same technician always gets same color.
Light and dark color variants for background and border styling with appropriate alpha values.
Grid styling constants: gridLineColor, currentTimeLineColor, weekendBackgroundColor, todayBackgroundColor.
Time slot color coding: available, booked, blocked, break slots with semantic color mapping.
Status color mapping synchronized with CalendarAppointment status colors.
Luminance-based text color calculation ensuring proper contrast on colored backgrounds.
Comprehensive dimension constants: header heights, column widths, row heights, padding values.
Responsive design breakpoints: mobile (600px), tablet (900px), desktop (1200px).
Dynamic column width calculation based on screen size for optimal calendar layout.
Maximum technician column calculation preventing layout overflow on smaller screens.
Appointment decoration factory with selection, past state, and conflict indicators.
Time slot decoration factory with availability, current time, and selection states.
Typography styles for different calendar components: time columns, headers, appointment text.
Animation duration constants for smooth transitions and user interactions.
Professional color scheme suitable for business calendar applications.
Accessibility considerations with proper contrast ratios and color differentiation.

components.CalendarViewMode: Enum defining different calendar view modes with comprehensive display options.

components.CalendarViewModeExtension: Extension providing metadata and display properties for each view mode.

rules: Comprehensive view mode options: day, week, weekGrid, weekChart, month, agenda.
Display name mapping providing user-friendly view mode labels.
Icon name mapping for consistent UI iconography across view mode selectors.
Day count calculation determining how many days each view mode displays.
Time slot visibility control based on view mode requirements and detail level.
Multi-day detection for views spanning multiple days requiring different layout strategies.
Compact mode identification for views with reduced detail and simplified presentation.
View mode extension pattern providing clean separation of enum and display logic.
Consistent naming convention matching common calendar application standards.
Flexible view system supporting various user preferences and use cases.

components.TimeSlot: Time slot model representing availability periods with appointment and block tracking.

components.TimeSlotGenerator: Utility class for generating and managing time slots with availability logic.

rules: Time-based availability tracking with start/end DateTime precision.
Availability status with reason tracking for breaks, lunch, blocks, and appointments.
Appointment association through appointmentId for booked time slot identification.
Technician assignment linking time slots to specific service providers.
Duration calculations in both minutes and hours for flexible time management.
Time-based state detection: isPast, isCurrentTime for real-time calendar updates.
Block type identification for breaks, lunch, and blocked time periods.
Appointment occupation detection with hasAppointment getter for booking status.
Visual styling properties: displayColor, borderColor based on slot status.
Current time highlighting with red border for real-time calendar indication.
JSON serialization supporting time slot persistence and data exchange.
CopyWith pattern for immutable time slot updates and modifications.
Equality implementation based on time range and technician for proper comparison.
TimeSlotGenerator utility providing automated slot creation for technician schedules.
Configurable slot generation: start/end hours, interval minutes, break/lunch/block times.
Time overlap detection algorithm for conflict identification and slot validation.
Available slot finder accommodating service duration requirements.
Consecutive slot validation ensuring services can be properly scheduled.
Preference-based slot sorting for optimal appointment booking suggestions.
Comprehensive time slot management supporting complex scheduling scenarios.
